knimeNode.name: XML To PMML
knimeNode.shortDescription: Transforms XML documents into PMML documents

fullDescription.intro: This node reads a column of XML values and outputs a column of PMML values.
fullDescription.option: If checked, the existing XML column is replaced by the one with PMML
The name of the appended PMML column
Fail if a cell in the XML column is not valid PMML. Else a missing value is inserted.

ports.inPort: The table containing a XML column
ports.outPort: A table with a PMML column
